feed.title: 13ft Ladder Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for 13ft Ladder: Version 0.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Dark Mode
  • Adds CI/CD pipeline with support for multiple platforms by @jbonadiman in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/15
  • Adding default protocol to URL inputs by @Joao620 in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/17
  • Improve UI by @luizpicolo in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/19

New Contributors

  • @jbonadiman made their first contribution in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/15
  • @Joao620 made their first contribution in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/17
  • @luizpicolo made their first contribution in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/19

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/compare/v0.2.3...v1.3.0

entry.title: New release for 13ft Ladder: Version 0.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/compare/v0.3.1...v0.3.2

entry.title: New release for 13ft Ladder: v0.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use correct command for docker compose by @nicolasff in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/23
  • Documentation for usage with SSL Proxy, Systemd, Customized Host / Port by @ckbaker10 in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/24
  • Update docker-compose.yaml by @a10kiloham in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/26

New Contributors

  • @nicolasff made their first contribution in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/23
  • @ckbaker10 made their first contribution in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/24
  • @a10kiloham made their first contribution in https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/pull/26

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wasi-master/13ft/compare/v0.3.2...v0.3.3
